title: 33% Scanning files 5ever.
body:
I have been waiting for 3 hours and my client is still sitting on 33%, steadily scanning files (10k+ at the moment). My internet isn't slow or anything, the seven other people I live with had their clients patched almost instantly. One of them was even running the Mac client (I am also using this client). 

Please help me, my flatmates just overtook me in rank,  and I must re-assert my dominance ♥

replies.body:
Hey yaiamone,

Can you try the solutions provided in the following thread:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues

Thanks, i'll give it a try ♥

Edit: It worked! Thanks so much {{summoner:31}}
Fantastic! Thanks for checking back and letting me know!
